## Description {#details}

Diagnostic information for missed-optimization remarks.

Definition at line 85 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoptimizationremarkemitter-h">MachineOptimizationRemarkEmitter.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### MachineOptimizationRemarkMissed() {#a9c71a8a0dda8332ca7321c7ab5420e9a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::MachineOptimizationRemarkMissed::MachineOptimizationRemarkMissed (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; PassName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RemarkName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticlocation">DiagnosticLocation</a> &amp; Loc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<code>PassName</code> is the name of the pass emitting this diagnostic.

If this name matches the regular expression given in -Rpass-missed=, then the diagnostic will be emitted. <code>RemarkName</code> is a textual identifier for the remark. <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code> is the debug location and <code>MBB</code> is the block that the optimization operates in.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoptimizationremarkemitter-h/#l00092">92</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoptimizationremarkemitter-h">MachineOptimizationRemarkEmitter.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
